stages.text: A towering moose meanders into the middle of the Trans-Canada, sizing up your headlights.

choices.label: Idle patiently
choices.outcome: You idle in neutral and wait for nature to decide.

effects.log: You burn a sip of gas idling behind the moose.

success.outcome: The moose takes the hint and lumbers off the shoulder.

effects.log: The moose wanders away with a frosty snort.

failure.outcome: The moose stares you down and taps the bumper.

effects.log: Fresh dent! The moose wins this round.

choices.label: Lay on the horn
choices.outcome: You tap the horn and hope for the best.

effects.log: Everyone stress-eats maple fudge during the standoff.

success.outcome: The honk startles the moose back into the bush.

effects.log: Success! The moose sprints into the spruce.
The moose wallops the hood before sauntering off.

stages.text: A pair of prairie truckers wave you into a rest stop, offering thermoses and tales of black ice ahead.

choices.label: Share stories and supplies
choices.outcome: You swap road stories and recipes for bannock.

effects.log: The truckers restock your snack bin with jerky and Nanaimo bars.

choices.label: Buy extra gas cans
choices.outcome: You trade some cash for a tidy jerrycan.

effects.log: A spare jerrycan sloshes in the trunk.
